name: @mindconnect/node-red-contrib-mindconnect
description: node red mindconnect node using mindconnect-nodejs library.

scripts.start-dev: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0  concurrently --raw "npm run node:watch"  "npm run ts:watch "
scripts.test-dev: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0  concurrently --raw  "npm run ts:watch " "npm run test:watch"
scripts.doc: compodoc -p tsconfig.json --output docs --name "@mindconnect/node-red-contrib-mindconnect" --theme material && cp -r images/ docs/
scripts.test: npm run ts:build && nyc mocha --colors --reporter spec  --timeout=5000 --exit
scripts.test-jenkins: npm run ts:build && cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=./report.xml mocha --colors --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter --timeout=15000 --exit
scripts.license: license-checker --csv --onlyAllow "Apache-2.0; Apache*; BSD; BSD-2-Clause; BSD-3-Clause; ISC; MIT; Unlicense; WTFPL; CC-BY-3.0; CC0-1.0" --production
scripts.license:summary: license-checker --summary --onlyAllow "Apache-2.0; Apache*; BSD; BSD-2-Clause; BSD-3-Clause; ISC; MIT; Unlicense; WTFPL; CC-BY-3.0; CC0-1.0" --production

author: @sn0wcat
